data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 128 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sidi Bou Zid, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: There are 429,900 people living in the state of Sidi Bou Zid. Only about 128 might be believers.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sidi Bou Zid, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, teach the 128 believers in Sidi Bou Zid that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 128 believers living in the state of Sidi Bou Zid. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Amazigh, Gafsa people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Sidi Bou Zid, Tunisia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 128 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Sidi Bou Zid.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sidi Bou Zid, Tunisia has a population of 429,900.

We estimate Sidi Bou Zid has 128 people who might know Jesus, 1,802 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 427,970 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sidi Bou Zid
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
